description:
"The Walking Dead's" Norman Reedus and Emily Kinney are reportedly seeing each other. See? Zombies don't just ruin lives, they also bring people together. 据报道，《行尸走肉》Norman Reedus和Emily Kinney正在约会。看到没？行尸除了会让大家疲于奔命以外，还可以让人产生情愫呢！

"They had a connection early on in the show," a source tells Us Weekly. "But the romance developed recently. They're still pretty guarded about it." “他们之前拍戏的时候就一直有联系，”《US》周刊报道。“但是他们的感情是最近一段时间才升温的。他们目前对他们的关系还是比较谨慎。”

The two actors worked alongside each other until 2014 when Kinney's beloved character, Beth, was surprisingly killed off. However, since her exit she has reportedly stayed connected to Reedus through texts, appearances and her music gigs. 这两位演员之前一直在一起工作，直到2014年Kinney在剧中颇受欢迎的角色Beth突然被杀。然而自从她退出剧组之后，听说他们就开始用短信联系，他还曾经出现在她的小型音乐活动上。

Reedus is currently filming Season 6 of "The Walking Dead" in Atlanta, and Kinney is on tour. The musician will be performing at Walker Stalker Con both in Florida and California this summer. At the time of posting, Zap2it reached out to a rep for Reedus and has not received a comment.最近Reedus正在亚特兰大拍摄《行尸走肉》第六季，儿Kinney则在做巡回演唱会。这位女歌手之前曾经出现在弗罗里达和加利福尼亚的Walker Stalker Con上。我们试图联系Reedus的经纪人，不过暂未得到回应。

title: 《行尸走肉》弩哥和Beth在一起啦！
